<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/chat/find"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Obtiene la lista de todos los chats individuales y grupos de la instancia.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"limit","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer"},"description":"Cantidad máxima de chats a retornar","required":false},{"name":"offset","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer"},"description":"Offset para paginación","required":false}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Lista de chats","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"JID del chat"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Nombre mostrado o alias"},"isGroup":{"type":"boolean"},"unreadCount":{"type":"integer"},"isMuted":{"type":"boolean"},"timestamp":{"type":"integer","description":"Timestamp del último mensaje"},"archived":{"type":"boolean"},"pinned":{"type":"boolean"}},"title":"Chat"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
